commit.message: Added test cases for all fail message formats

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@

+// error-pattern:task failed at 'assertion failed: false'
+
+fn main() {
+    assert!(false);
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@

+

+
+fn main() {
+    assert!(false, "test-assert-fmt %d %s", 42, "rust");
+}
